name: Santa's Delivery Mission!
description:
My entry for #2buttonsjam, a endless scroller/pseudo-shooter game where you need to drop presents to score and avoid/destroy obstacles with your laser!

Controls:

  • LMB - Ascend 
  • RMB - Drop Gift

Art and Sounds:

  • https://opengameart.org/users/shiru8bit
  • https://opengameart.org/content/holiday-expansion-set
  • https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-holiday-sprites
  • https://opengameart.org/content/explosion-3
